name: Flappy Bird: Board Game
description:
What if Flappy Bird was a turn-based table-top game, with a dice and chips to play?

Rules are simple:

  1. There's two-sided bird chip in the game, with flying bird on one side and gliding bird on another, which represent bird momentum (gliding horizontally or falling down).
  2. Each turn player decide, whether he wanna flap wings, or skip the turn.
  3. Goal is pretty much the same - avoid hitting the ground or cellar, get points for flying through tubes.

Please consider supporting the game by leaving feedback in comment section below, sharing this link with friends, and - hell, why not?, - donating some tips.

Thanks!
